text: A rogue trader is person who makes financial trades in an unauthorised manner. Rogue trader may also refer to: *Rogue Trader (book), the autobiography of (and later a movie about) Nick Leeson, the man who caused the collapse of Barings Bank *Rogue Trader (film), the 1999 film about Nick Leeson directed by James Dearden *Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, the first edition of the Warhammer 40,000 franchise **Rogue Trader (role-playing game), the second role-playing game in the Warhammer 40,000 roleplay sub-franchise ==See also== * Rogue Traders, an Australian electronic rock group * Rogue Traders (TV series), a BBC consumer affairs television series
title: Rogue trader (disambiguation)
